name: Wisp City Online
description:
The Wisps have lost their city - time to rebuild! It may take time, but the wisps will create something beautiful!

Wisp City is a persistent online multiplayer creative game. Come place your mark in the world of the Wisps! No account required!

Have a group of friends? Part of a community? Livestreaming gamejam games? Invite the whole party to start building!

Controls:

Shift: Build a Cone
Q: Build a Cylinder
E: Build a Cube
W: Walk Forward
A: Walk Left
S: Walk Back
D: Walk Right
Mouse: Aim the mouse to change the rotation of the object.

Note: All shapes are permanent, they can't be destroyed. What ancient structures will the Wisps make?

Everything was created by myself, TheMainStark - Sound, Music, VFX, Textures, Images, Code, ect.

WispCity is an Army-of-One submission for the UE4 2020 MegaJam.

After zip, Wisp City Online is 80 MB.

Playfab API was used to enable communication with the Playfab servers but does not include any pre-built code.
